title: Strawberry Granita
directions: *Note: freezing times will vary greatly depending on how cold, empty, large, etc., your freezer is. Just keep checking and forking!
ingredients: (Note: Yes, this will work with other fruit and berry purees)
1/3 to 1/2 cup white sugar (depending on sweetness of berries)
(Note: I've not tried other types of sweeteners)
